id.description: The unique ID of the Event-Band

event_id.description: The ID of the Concert-Event from 'ConcertEvents' table

band_id.description: The ID of the Concert-Band from 'ConcertBands' table

setlist.description: A JSON column storing arbitrary key-value pairs (optional)

rating.description: A rating for the band's performance (e.g., a scale from 1 to 10) (optional)

mainAct.description: If the band is the main act true, false otherwise

runningOrder.description: The order when the band played
